name: Babygravebat
text: I usually love this location & a few regular employees have been sweet to me in all my visits, it's why I would drive all the way from Irvine to come here, but ever since the pandemic started, there has been a huge switch in customer …More

name: Chonna Cristelle
text: So thankful blaze has vegan cheese! I personally get no cheese because the vegan cheese 🧀 is a little gooey on the roof of my mouth, but my boyfriend loves pizza and adds the vegan cheese so I’m so thankful that they have an option for him! They are super quick and always accurate. I’m never disappointed. Thank you!

name: Richard Morgan
text: Keto crust was good. It was fast even though we were there on a Saturday night.

name: Dylan Andersen
text: Blaze is good but this location is a major bummer due to no outdoor seating. A million tables inside but due to the pandemic, you can't dine in. Not their fault per se, but really wish the franchise owner would work with the retail center landlord and get some outdoor seating somehow.

name: Valentin Schaefer
text: Great and delicious food, I liked the character the spot has, and the employees were helpful. I will definitely come back in the future.

name: Paul Ytuarte
text: The meat eater, that the one to get and bacon and black olives you can't go wrong  oh and awesome service.

name: Danny
text: Great staff here. Stopped in last Sunday and the staff were awesome and the pizza itself was incredible. Thank you all so much for your great service!

name: Andy P
text: Pretty good options for pizza, especially the keto one. Bit pricey for the portion size though. One keto pizza is sufficient for one person only.

name: Andriy Dyatel
text: Horrible service. Do not order online. They lost my order then lied to me it was in the oven, then did it. I waited extra 30 minutes from promised time. No apology. Pizza was 10 times worse in quality than those I ordered face to face.

name: Linda Aspot
text: Came to Blaze today and my pizza was absolutely delicious! Even though my pizza was delicious and I got everything I asked for. The customer service from Lauren was spectacular! Such a friendly and welcoming smile. Her customer service is the type that keeps loyal customers returning. One happy customer.

name: Jack Mathis
text: Just almost as good as Pieology, but much closer to home. Fast and delicious.

name: Elizabeth Manning
text: Pizza is good but staff just ignores u

name: Nima Mansouri
text: There were 2 other orders besides mine, AND THEY STILL GOT MY ORDER WRONG! Aside from the dirty containers they use for the ingredients, they got 5 people working a line doable by 2 guys and still got my order wrong. Remember guys YOU LABEL …More

name: Alexander Leroux
text: Good pizza. Prompt service.

name: Donald Cooley
text: It's a great concept, simple & very efficient, good value and the food was very good. The new normal

name: Deb Massa
text: I ordered "take two" half pizza half salad. Got the arugula and fruit salad with goat cheese, balsamic vinaigrette, very tasty. Pizza topped with red sauce, mozzarella and parmesan cheese, pepperoni, salami, artichoke, fresh tomatoes and …More

name: ashoke nigam
text: Meh pizza, more of a gimic than anything great

name: Sarah
text: Friendly staff and best tasting pizzas in town!

name: Michael Ledesma
text: Never have a bad pizza ever again. This is a make it your own style pizza with a ton of options. You can change any sauce you want with an endless amount of toppings. You can do gluten free and a bunch of healthier options. I stick to the usual pizza with thick crust

name: Garrett Frank
text: Great pizza with fresh ingredients,personal favorite 😋

name: Jeff Oostyen
text: This is a great place. Good options if you're on a "special" diet. They start a little chincy with the toppings, but will always give you more without question IF you ask. So ask, it's all good. The salads are very good too.

name: Salvador Rangel
text: Best pizzas. We love coming here with the children. Fast and courteous service and comfortable prices. 5 stars.

name: Kian Zadeh
text: Awesome customer service! I really appreciate how quick you guys help us. I once got a pizza here and it was done and in the oven in like 30 seconds. Your pizza quality is off the charts. You  now have a permanent fan for life!

name: Sz M
text: Unfortunately my pizza was inedible. I just realized at home that it is a massive piece of "carbon". No wonder why... the guys at the oven changed place with each other two times. If you're not sure at least check before you give out. I heard good things about blaze pizza but for me it was a very bad experience. :/

name: Claudia
text: The music is way too loud. You can’t even hear them ask you what you want on the pizza. Everyone is Yelling!!! Not coming back. There are no paper straws offered either. They need more smiling faces and a lot better management.

name: Ron Cohen
text: Pizza was badly burned on the bottom.  This was probably the worst pizza I have ever had.  Pizza was also very small.  It might have been good for one person.  Service was very slow.  Staff missed pick-up time by around 15 minutes.

name: Abrha Assad
text: Great food. Fast service. Good pricing. What more do you need?

name: Soumyo Surya Bairi
text: Its a new experience with friendly stuff when they are literally making the pizza in front of you and you can choose as much as topping you want.Definitely will be back. …More

name: zohreh vatankhah
text: Favorite pizza . I wish they serve Halal meat & chicken .

name: ke sorensen
text: Not very good at following orders. Lots of things missing on the pizza for pickup. Been to other places and it seems this one is not managed very well. Not coming back

name: Kat B
text: I love that I can make my pizza MY WAY! I also love how affordable it is, excellent for full-time students on a budget!

name: Chris Murphy
text: Pizza is pretty good, it's quick if you have a short lunch. Dining room is like a cafeteria with loud music playing.

name: Cynthia Itpick
text: Veggie pizza? Well it's any type of pizza you want really. Enjoy!

name: Max Vargas
text: I have never been to a Blaze Pizza before and had heard that they now offer a Keto Crust (6 net carbs). I went with a build your own. The pizza was very good tasting but reason for not 5 stars was the crust was a little under cooked for my …More

name: Gucci Jays
text: Yesterday I was helped by Lauren. She had a warm welcoming smile when greeted me when I walked through the door. She helped me choose between getting a regular pizza or the skyscraper since I had never been there. She was very helpful in …More

name: Keanu Villa
text: Great pizzas very tasty. Recommended.

name: Time Boom
text: Wow, great pizza, thin or thick crust! My sister took me here for my birthday and it was fun, not your usual pizza parlor, people in general (Californians anyway) are very creative, and want something different to eat, wish I’d taken pics, but if different is your thing, then I recommend Blaze Pizza.

name: Kathleen Davis
text: Came to Blaze today and my pizza was absolutely delicious! Even though my pizza was delicious and I got everything I asked for. The customer service from Lauren was spectacular! Such a friendly and welcoming smile. Her customer service is the type that keeps loyal customers returning. One happy customer.

name: Gary Petersen
text: Tasty pizza, and completely customizable. Fair price for these individual pizzas. Very noisy with kids on the early Saturday evening we were there. Friendly, helpful staff. Vegan options. Very good beverage options. Beer was available, but I did not see any wine options.

name: Steve Teehee
text: The pizza used to be good. Now is very dry, what happened?

name: Jason Berry
text: Noisy venue with excellent pizza.  If you are picking up your pizza, this is 5 stars.  If you have kids and you are not necessarily in the mood for peaceful, also 5 stars.  The interior is very spartan and loud. …More

name: Mike C/M
text: great pizza. great staff

name: Nancy Lauchaire
text: Blaze was a real treat. We had a great meal and we designed our own pizzas the way we wanted to have them. I was glad to eat at Blaze while visiting family in California.

name: Amy Grande
text: 11/17 Wonderful experiance! Jose and the yong blond ladie making my pizza went beyond expectations. Thank you for your wonderful customer service!

name: Alisha
text: The pizza is normally good. However today when my son asked to have BBQ sauce & Pesto sauce added to his "to-go" pizza at the end, the service person added hot sauce instead of BBQ sauce. We didn't know until we got home. He was not able to …More

name: Brian B
text: Really friendly accommodating staff (worthy of 5 stars!), and a great clone of other economical assembly line pizza joints like MOD Pizza. However, while the pizza was good, I didn't find it quite as good as MOD. Maybe I just need to come back and try something different. Grateful for the gluten-free crust option.

name: Anna Nickum
text: It was good pizza and they were fast and helpful

name: Lupe Melendez
text: The place was dirty.  My pizza dough had black specks.  When I told the girl all she did was flick the black specks away.  All the different toppings were all commingle and there were croutons on the pizza sauce. It was pretty gross.

name: Robert Alvarado
text: Kind of a tough call. I loved my pizza. Cooked perfectly and I loved the thin crust with just the right amount of crunch. Service could have been better. We ate our pizzas there. Overall place was not the cleanest. Gouges in the wall and …More

name: Stanislaus Suares
text: A healthy  make your own pizza,  polite and friendly support staff.

text:
That was the worst pizza ever .
Burn all of the my orders there wasn't any straw for drinking and compare with the other branches the staff who made pizza was rude and not nice

name: Angelica Alba
text: Terrible service. I usually love blaze, but this time definitely left me disappointed. Placed an online order at 405p for 440p pick up. Arrived at 435p. Was told my pizzas were in the oven. At 443p I notice the employee making my pizzas. At …More

name: Sammy Roberts
text: Pizza is great, service is ok, environment is surprisingly nice.

name: Valerie Hutchins
text: I visit the place all the time and am always happy. This is one of those typical build your own pizza places. They have gluten free and vegan options and a good range of cheeses, sauces, meats, and veggies. As weird as it might sound, I …More

text: Great service and staff. Place was clean. The keto pizza needs some work.

name: Dominic Stevens
text: Pizzas are pretty good and, given the area, moderately priced. Salads are rather small unfortunately. Soft drinks have an interesting and tasty variety. Good amount of room for seating. Be sure to specify the type of sauce and toppings …More

name: tim depies
text: My experience with Blaze Pizza is from eating there one time so not enough data to be real accurate however from this single visit I can say it was delightful. I was first assisted by a young lady with a smile who began asking me what i …More

text: Amazing people.amazing food! Best blaze ever!!

name: Charles Aquino
text:
Blaze pizza is excellent. No doubt about it.

This location in particular is a great establishment. I was greeted almost …More

name: Jordan Tolbert
text: Very good. Never had it before and I was pretty impressed. For the price, it can't be beat. Staff was great and the restaurant clean. Would definitely recommend

name: Raymond C. Lenz
text: Finishing up a great day with a salad and Coca-Cola .

name: Jan Thuney
text: First time in one. Got the build your own. Delicious. Too noisy for chatting with friends. No coffee.

name: StamX
text: It's Blaze Pizza. Nothing more, but nothing less; it's service is good enough, and the food also tastes quite good. Nothing lerticularly negative to say, but the lines were slow.

name: Cindy Russell
text: Love that they have so many choices for veggies & different cheese toppings.

name: Hoons Viper
text: It's good. Convenient over the other pizza chains and tastes better. I like the thin crust or if you want a thicker crust like my gf you can ask for a high rise were they double the dough. The  Oven makes quick work of it. Not a super fan of the salads. But its preference

name: Angelo Cave
text: I'm happy my co-workers decided to eat here.  The pizza was good, fast, and made my way.  The employees were welcoming and ready to help.  Well done.

name: Klaus Bello
text: great quality. if you like to get your pizza with the ingredients you desire and like more than they add you MUST insist. otherwise the motto is 'as little as possible'. however awesome place and thank you for being here.

name: J C
text: This place goes all out with toppings. They aren't stingy and it's all premium quality stuff. Great size eatery. Did you say party of 20, no problem! There's plenty of seats and everyone gets their own pizza. Reasonable prices at only $8.50 minimum for what I say is a medium sized pizza with 6 slices.

name: Owen Binckes
text: Pretty decent. I support LeBran James and all, but the pizza was kinda cold, and the staff would not give me ALL the cheese I wanted. But mostly, it was good, but the pizza was cold when it got to my table.

name: Logann Gabriael
text: Food is good as always, but 90% of the staff just seemed very unhappy to be there and were not friendly. Won’t be back to this location any time soon..

name: Christopher Lopez
text: Great place to get a quick and tasty personalized pizza. The staff is always pretty friendly here. The only times its not great is when they are super busy or short staffed, but that's the same anywhere.

name: Jesyla S.
text: Delicious and fully customizable. They can do vegan, gluten free, lactose free, if you have histamine intolerance their white sauce has no garlic or pepper.  All in all a great place especially for groups that have people with various dietary requirements or preferences. I Love this place!

name: Dan P
text: Gotta love it. Subway of pizza. Pick your toppings as much as you like. One price.

name: Melissa Roellich
text: The lines are very long to order.  It was loud so it was hard for them to understand the order and had to repeat it over the sneeze guard which seems to defeat the purpose

name: Braden Nielson
text: Good place if you are looking for a nice pie of pizza. This isn't the most amazing pizza, but it is quick, it is fresh, and it is made to order right in front of you. It makes if for a fun experience. There is only one size (which helps …More

name: simin sardar
text: It was really bad today 😡

name: Aaron Willis
text: Great pizza! Very allergy aware. It was easy to get a dairy-free, gluten free pizza!

name: Mark McQuaid
text: Best pizza place I have been to. Can customize your own pizza for under  $10.00. They do not skimp on options and the pizza is excellent.  Staff is very pleasant and I would highly recommend this establishment.  Something that I would rarely say.

name: Gebre Kebede
text: The best pizza of all time

name: Will Biggs
text: I loved this place! I know there are a lot of design your own pizza places out now, but this one distinguishes itself. The decor is beautiful. The service is fast. The ingredients are great. My wife and I frequent this location.

name: David Boston
text: Choose your own toppings, as many as you want. Extra cheese & sauce, no problem. Fresh and tasty - enjoy !

name: sonia ball
text: Love that you offer keto crust! Thank you

name: Arthur Garcia
text: Compared to other pizza places like this where you basically create your own, I think this beats them all. The quality of the meats is top notch and the pie doesn't feel greasy in the hands.

name: Aaron Svedin
text: The business is tucked in a corner, arrived at 5:30 to a short line and at 6:30 it was very busy. The red sauce was good and the create your own as you follow your pizza down the make line was different but fun.

name: Jim Roache
text: No straw policy, but plastic, plastic everywhere, mountains of napkins and ballistic proof cardboard boxes. How politically correct!  You just lost another customer back to Pepinos.

text: Easy to stop and get a "build your own" pizza for each person in the family or group with a tasty thin crust made fresh and choices of some healthy toppings. 🙂

text: Best pizza ever... and I'm not much of a pizza fan. I like that they have healthy drink options too.

name: Chris Bogstad
text: Really good pizza for such fast service. The base of the pizza seemed a little too soft for my tastes, but the options were great and you can't beat the wait time. …More

name: Chris B
text: Great tasting Pizza, super friendly staff and haven't had a undercooked pizza yet.

name: Jay Starr
text: Good quality, but the crust is a bit tough which can cause a mess. Only one size is offered for the price, that leaves me a bit hungry afterwards. But the ingredients are top notch making it a great pizza. I just like fluffy crusts, so I would go elsewhere.

name: Drake A
text: Great

text: We ordered our Pizza online to avoid the crowd, when we arriced at the exact time we were supposed to we were told our Pizzas was in the oven. name: Krissy Kyle
text: Easy quick bite out. It's build your own pizza so everybody wins. Friendly staff.

The King Of pizza 🍕 ps if there are cool people around you its because they Blaze.

text: Pizza the way you want it!  The prices are great and the staff are friendly.   The pizzas come out of the oven in 180 seconds or something like that.  I love the food.  Keep an eye out for coupons that get sent home every month.

name: Cydney Lopez
text: Horrible experience. The person who took my order was very slow and that made the entire process go much slower and took up my entire lunch break. I will not be going back to this location. The Mission Viejo Mall location is a lot faster …More

text: I do love me some Blaze Pizzas. I heard about the free pizza on the 19th. What I didn't think about prior to coming here is that I got there when Aliso Niguel school got out about the same time I arrived. So there was a whole sleuth of …More

text: Good place if you like creating a custom Pizza, but after some time the Blaze became less popular, but I still believe it's a great place.

name: Bob Bob
text: Cashiers are typically friendly enough for ordering, interior is nice casual design, occasionally in need of more cleaning on tables and floors, pizzas will frequently be made sloppily, burnt on the bottom, overly greasy, lower overall quality in general relative to the food here than other blaze pizzas unfortunately.
